// start by going through a cycle of the fsm
1111_1111_1_0_1000000 // RESET
1111_1110_0_1_1000000 // B0
1111_1110_1_0_1000000 // R0
1111_1101_0_1_1000000 // B1
1111_1101_1_0_1000000 // B1
1111_1101_0_1_1000000 // R1
1111_1011_1_0_1000000 // B2

1011_1110_0_1_1000000 // B0
1011_1110_1_0_1000000 // R0
1011_1110_0_1_1000000 // D0, counter = 0
1011_1110_1_0_1000000 // D0, counter = 1

1011_1110_1_0_1000000 // D0, counter = 13
1011_1110_0_1_1000000 // D0, counter = 14
1011_1110_1_0_1000000 // D0, counter = 15
1011_1110_0_1_1000000 // D0, counter = 0
1011_1110_1_0_1000000 // P0
1011_1110_0_1_0100100 // W0
1011_1110_1_0_1000000 // W0
1111_1110_0_1_0100100 // W0
1111_1110_1_0_1000000 // W0
1111_1110_0_1_0100100 // W0
1111_1110_1_0_1000000 // R0
1111_1101_0_1_0100100 // B1
